summary: Stroti's bathroom converted from [url="http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35420/"]Oblivion[/url] includes a working bath, washbasin, drawer (without animation, I've have included one with animation but this is a WIP), cupboard (without animation), working flushable toilet (with an animated toilet lid so this replaces the toiletOpen
descriptionHtml:
=============================
Stroti's Bathroom Resource for Skyrim
=============================

by Stroti

Converted by bruce142

=============================
Modder's resource
=============================

[s]THIS MOD REQUIRES LATEST VERSION OF SKSE (http://skse.silverlock.org/). This mod is not adult-only as it doesn't introduces new body textures, but it does unequip all of your clothes when taking a bath or using the toilet.[/s], no longer since version 1.2.

This is a conversion of Stroti's Bathroom Resource, originally published for Oblivion. You can find the original resource files here:

http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35420/

I've managed to use the same textures and assets as the Oblivion mod.

The mod includes a working bath, washbasin, drawer (without animation, I've have included one with animation but this is a WIP), cupboard (without animation), working flushable toilet (with an animated toilet lid so this replaces the toiletOpen and toiletClosed from the original mod).

To see the bathroom ingame type "coc bathroom" in the console.

==============================
Known issues
==============================

The first time, you open the toilet lid it seems to rotate, but if you close it again and reopen it the toilet lid opens like it should.

[s]If you watch closely with a Free Cam (console command : tfc), the character using the toilet seems to hover over it, I've tried numerous collisions but I can't seem to fix this.[/s], fixed in version 1.2.

=================
Tools used:
=================

3DSMax 9
Nifskope
Creation Kit
NifUtils by Skyfox

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modder's resource. You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.

Do not upload to other sites.

=================
Credits:
=================

Stroti for making the original meshes and textures.
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils (a tutorial can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21065).
Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit.
author: Stroti and bruce142

files.name: Strotis Bathroom
files.changelogHtml: made test cell "Bathroom" from scratch - Skyrim resources only

files.name: Stroti Bathroom
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed test cell : moved toilet back a little bit + fixed texture sets floors and roofing
Removed SKSE requirement - drawback : no automatic (un)equipment of armor and gear
Fixed collision bath and toilet, player no longer hovering over these two furnitures
Fixed black panel washbasin
